div.div: Jahnis parahda/ ka JEſus muhſchigs Deews

* Kriſtus tohp tas Wahrds noẜaukts, tapehz
(1) Ka Deews ne ar Rohkam, bet ar Wahrdu,
tas ir, ar un zaur ẜawu Dehlu to Paẜauli raddijis.

es jums to Pateeẜibu eẜmu runnajis/

Eẜẜi tu wairak ne ka muhẜu
Ko darrees tu pats no ẜewim?
ẜewi pats gohdu/ tad mans Gohds
kas manni gohdi/ ko juhs ẜakkat
un kad es ẜazzitu/ ka es to ne
